author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Rub the inside of the tomato with the garlic and oil and bake in the oven for five minutes. Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan.  Add the spring onion to the beaten egg, then add to the pan.  Scramble.
ingredients: 1 beef tomato, sliced in half, hollowed out,  2 garlic cloves, cut in half,  1 tsp olive oil,  1 tsp butter,  2 free-range eggs, beaten,  2 tbsp spring onions, chopped
